CURRENT REQUIREMENTS
The current requirement:
Business Development Executive / Manager – Personal Care
Location UK/IT/DE/BNL
This role is part of the global push in growing the personal global group
Personal Care is seen as a key pillar to the growth of the Sasol Chemicals Division
Personal Care has a relatively flat management structure and is considered under resourced in both  EMEA and USA each area has differing market needs.
Currently the existing teams are heavily focused on specific client Key account management, and it is such that there is little opportunity to develop and nurture new clients. The upshot of this there is significant risk should an existing Key Account pull back.
The idea in the USA and EMEA is that new BDM’s would take the opportunity to target one or more the 20  CURRENT REQUIREMENTS
The current requirement:
Business Development Executive / Manager – Personal Care
Location UK/IT/DE/BNL
This role is part of the global push in growing the personal global group
Personal Care is seen as a key pillar to the growth of the Sasol Chemicals Division
Personal Care has a relatively flat management structure and is considered under resourced in both  EMEA and USA each area has differing market needs.
Currently the existing teams are heavily focused on specific client Key account management, and it is such that there is little opportunity to develop and nurture new clients. The upshot of this there is significant risk should an existing Key Account pull back.
The idea in the USA and EMEA is that new BDM’s would take the opportunity to target one or more the 20 main potential clients Sasol has identified as strategic to the growth of the business.
From a recruitment standpoint this also makes considerable sense as a candidate with in-depth knowledge of a potential target client – will have a great deal of traction with that client than starting a playbook from scratch
We will target candidates who work for companies that service the strategic target companies
Aside from all the aspects of the role in terms of personal care / cosmetics – 5-10 years’ experience we need to focus on the softer skills.
Drive / Energy / Persistence and an entrepreneurial nature are too name a few
The way this sector works is such that the development of business streams requires patience and determination
From a USA BDM perspective the role is different and whilst this proposal does not cover the US sector it is important to note the difference in the two markets. – in the US the search will be for someone who has not just Key account experience but also the ability to identify / build and grow – a distribution network.
We have structured our offer in a staggered manner – this is set as such with the greater incentive focused on the final delivery element. It has been specifically designed this way as this will be the first Sasol project, and have based the fee on a mid point of the DE salary.
It is our policy to stay clear of current JVCL clients such as BASF and as such we will search in these companies – this approach will be similarly respected in the future with Sasol
FEE STRUCTURE
Our typical fees for this search would be 25%, This enables to maintain our long-standing relationship and remain competitive.
The costs applicable are broken down into three stages, as follows:
All charges are subject to Value Added Tax at the current rate where applicable.
Expenses
The costs applicable in respect of the Retainer are in relation to the Client’s initial instructions to and/or appointment of the Company and all preparatory work undertaken whether on after or before the signing of this agreement. As part of the assignment service we provide, all candidates put forward at shortlist stage will have been personally interviewed and vetted. The expense allocation for interviews, meetings, travel, sustenance, etc. is payable by the client on receipt of invoice, clearly Johnston Vere will endeavour to keep these costs to an absolute minimum.
GUARANTEE
In the event of payment having been received in accordance with our payment terms, then in the event of a candidate leaving of their own volition, we operate a sliding scale refund system:
If the candidate leaves within 4 weeks, 75% of the final fee is refunded.
If the candidate leaves within 8 weeks, 50% of the final fee is refunded.
If the candidate leaves within 12 weeks, 25% of the final fee is refunded.
A client can elect a replacement candidate in lieu of a refund.
THE RECRUITMENT PROCESS
ABOUT US
Johnston Vere is a niche recruitment consultancy that actually consults! We offer a mix of broad industry knowledge, technical expertise, and success in recruitment at the highest level.
For over 30 years we have been partnering world-class technology, software and engineering companies; sourcing key executive, management, technical and commercial personnel throughout the world.
Our aim is to develop long term relationships with clients. We integrate ourselves fully within client

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
